description.eng: A series of civil protests that took place in Lebanon
description.por: Uma série de manifestações sociais ocorridas no Líbano
description.ara: مجموعة من التظاهرات المدنية التي اجتاحت لبنان

description.eng: Saad Hariri resigns in response to protests against the government
description.por: Saad Hariri renuncia em resposta às manifestações contra o governo
description.ara: سعد الحريري يستقيل ردّاً على التظاهرات ضد الحكومة

description.eng: Protests are part of the revolution initiated in October 2019
description.por: As manifestações fazem parte da revolução iniciada em outubro de 2019
description.ara: تشكّل التظاهرات جزءاً من الثورة التي انطلقت في تشرين الأول 2019

description.eng: The 1st case of COVID19 in Lebanon is confirmed in Beirut
description.por: O primeiro caso de Covid-19 no Líbano é confirmado em Beirute
description.ara: أول حالة كوفيد-19 في لبنان تؤكَّد في بيروت

description.eng: The first COVID19 death is recorded
description.por: A primeira morte de Covid-19 é registrada

description.eng: A large amount of ammonium nitrate stored at the Port of Beirut explodes
description.por: Uma grande quantidade de nitrato de amônio armazenada no porto de Beirute explode
description.ara: انفجرت كمية كبيرة من نيترات الأمونيوم المخزنة في مرفأ بيروت

description.eng: Prime Minister Hassan Diab announced that he and his entire cabinet had resigned following anger over the Beirut explosions
description.por: O primeiro-ministro Hassan Diab anuncia a própria renúncia e de todo seu gabinete após a revolta provocada pelas explosões em Beirute
description.ara: أعلن رئيس الوزراء حسان دياب استقالته وحكومته كاملةً بعد موجة الغضب التي تلت انفجار بيروت

title.por: Renúncia do primeiro-ministro e de seu gabinete
